General.Name: Ritco Logistics Limited
General.Description: Ritco Logistics Limited provides logistics and supply chain management services in India. The company offers contract logistics, full truck load transportation, warehouse and distribution, and fleet management services. It serves clients in the textile, automobile, FMCG, agriculture, pharmaceutical, electronic, petroleum, healthcare, metal, cement, mineral, retail, beverages, heavy engineering, steel, and petrochemical industries. Ritco Logistics Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Gurugram, India.
